fields.title: Python Programming Fundamentals
fields.description: Learn the basics of Python programming from scratch. Cover variables, functions, loops, and object-oriented programming.

fields.title: Advanced JavaScript and ES6+
fields.description: Master modern JavaScript features including async/await, modules, classes, and advanced DOM manipulation.

fields.title: Data Science with Python
fields.description: Comprehensive introduction to data science using Python, pandas, NumPy, and matplotlib for data analysis.

fields.title: Machine Learning Basics
fields.description: Introduction to machine learning concepts, algorithms, and practical applications using scikit-learn.

fields.title: React.js Complete Guide
fields.description: Build modern web applications with React.js. Learn components, hooks, state management, and routing.

fields.title: Database Design and SQL
fields.description: Learn database fundamentals, SQL queries, database design principles, and optimization techniques.

fields.title: Cloud Computing with AWS
fields.description: Master AWS cloud services including EC2, S3, Lambda, and learn cloud architecture best practices.

fields.title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
fields.description: Learn essential cybersecurity concepts, threat analysis, encryption, and security best practices.

fields.title: UI/UX Design Principles
fields.description: Master user interface and user experience design principles, wireframing, and prototyping.

fields.title: DevOps and CI/CD
fields.description: Learn DevOps practices, continuous integration, deployment pipelines, and infrastructure automation.

fields.title: Mobile App Development with Flutter
fields.description: Build cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart programming language.

fields.title: Artificial Intelligence Foundations
fields.description: Introduction to AI concepts, neural networks, deep learning, and practical AI applications.
